link.intro.title: Linking your Minecraft account
link.intro.desc:
Hey %s, thanks for linking your account to Discraft!

Before we continue, just know that the code you're about to enter contains sensitive data. 
**Don't give it to anyone!** It will be used to link your Minecraft account to your Discord account. 
To link your account, first join a Minecraft server of your choice running the Discraft plugin.

**Preferably, a server that you know and trust.**

Once you're connected, run the following command:
||``/discraft link %s``||
